}}
'''Frogs''' are a crafting material used in crafting.

==How to Obtain==
They can be found in the wild near bodies of fresh water, and come in different varieties. All varieties are simplified into the same type of component.
*[[Frog]]
*[[Blue Frog]] ([[Springvale]])
*[[Forest Tree Frog]] ([[Vimara Village]], [[Apam Woods]])
*[[Mud Frog]] ([[Stormterror's Lair]], [[Minlin]]?) <!--confirmed Stormterror's Lair-->
